process.name: process
process.description: Retrieve day length (minutes) for the given day-of-year using precomputed values for the specified latitude.

functions.name: init
functions.description: Precompute day length (minutes) by day of year for the given latitude.

functions.name: process
functions.description: Set DayLength for iDayOfYear using the precomputed array.

comments.comment: pDaylength is an internal (private) array computed in init and used in process; it is not part of the public inputs/outputs. Ranges/defaults follow createVariables(): cLatitude 0..90 (default 60), iDayOfYear 1..366, DayLength 0..1441 (default 0). DayLength is categorized as auxiliary since it is a derived output.
